name: Epson America
overview: Epson America, Inc. designs, manufactures, and sells image capture and image output products for consumer, business, photography, and graphic arts markets. It provides ink jet printers, compact photo printers, scanners, multimedia and desktop mobile projectors, ink cartridges, and supplies and accessories, as well as professional imaging, paper and media, digital photography, and home entertainment products. The company also supplies point-of-sale printers and transaction terminals for the retail market. It offers its products for entrepreneurs, businesses, and higher education market through retail outlets in the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. The company was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Long Beach, California with sales offices in the United States, Colombia, and Peru. It has subsidiaries in Argentina, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Costa Rica, Mexico, and Venezuela. Epson America, Inc. is a subsidiary of Seiko Epson Corporation.
